actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Trade Act of 1974 to provide that the procedure for congressional consideration of bills implementing trade agreements shall only apply to bills affecting programs under the Small Business Act or requirements of the Buy American Act.

summary.text: Stipulates that the procedure established pursuant to the Trade Act of 1974 for congressional consideration of bills implementing trade agreements on tariff barriers and resolutions approving commercial agreements with communist countries shall not apply to bills affecting programs under the Small Business Act or requirements of the Buy American Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Trade Act of 1974 to provide that the procedure for congressional consideration of bills implementing trade agreements shall only apply to bills affecting programs under the Small Business Act or requirements of the Buy American Act.
